Articles.Content: My kids have been really into Perler Beads lately (hobby/craft) ... so I decided to try it out myself with something appropriate ... it's supposed to be a rendition of the KSP logo ... I could have made it much bigger and better but I wanted to see how a smaller version would turn out first:
I like those perler thingies. Wish they were easier to get where I live, though. Guess Pixel Art is the best way to gor me.

Amazon has them for pretty cheap

http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=bl_sr_toys-and-games?ie=UTF8&field-brandtextbin=Perler&node=165793011
